text: Consider the virtual page reference string 1,2,3,2,4,1,3,2,4,1 on a demand paged virtual memory system running on a computer system that has main memory size of 3 page frames which are initially empty. Let LRU, FIFO and OPTIMAL denote the number of page faults under the corresponding page replacement policy. Then A.OPTIMAL < LRU < FIFO B.OPTIMAL < FIFO < LRU C.OPTIMAL = LRU D. OPTIMAL = FIFO gatecse-2012 operating-system page-replacement normal
